subject: Re: TWO loops and ONE
body:
On 7/3/07, Amichai Teumim  wrote:
snip
> my $n = @array;
>
> for my $i (0 .. $n-1) {
>    for my $j (0 .. $n-1) {
snip

What is the value of @array[$j+1] when $j is at the end of the range ($n - 1)?
